mapper.update: UPDATE T4_DELIVERY_USER SET U_DADDR = #{addr}, U_DADDRDETAIL = #{addrDetail}, U_DNAME = #{uDname}, U_DPHONE = #{uDphone}, ZIPNO = #{zipNo} WHERE U_ID = #{uId} AND DU_NO = #{duNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T4_DELIVERY_USER (U_ID, U_DNAME, U_DPHONE, U_DADDR, U_DADDRDETAIL, ZIPNO) VALUES (#{uId}, #{uDname}, #{uDphone}, #{addr}, #{addrDetail}, #{zipNo})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT, O.O_NO, O.*, P.*, D.*, U.*, A.* FROM T4_ORDER O INNER JOIN T4_PRODUCT P ON O.P_NO = P.P_NO INNER JOIN T4_DELIVERY D ON O.O_NO = D.O_NO INNER JOIN T4_DELIVERY_USER U ON O.U_ID = U.U_ID INNER JOIN ( SELECT O.O_NO, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM T4_ORDER O INNER JOIN T4_DELIVERY D ON O.O_NO = D.O_NO INNER JOIN T4_PRODUCT P ON O.P_NO = P.P_NO WHERE D_STATE IN ('상품 준비중', '배송 준비중', '배송중', '배송완료') AND O.O_NO = O.O_NO AND EXCHANGE = '' GROUP BY O.O_NO)A ON O.O_NO = A.O_NO WHERE D_STATE IN ('상품 준비중', '배송 준비중', '배송중', '배송완료') GROUP BY O.O_NO ORDER BY CASE D_STATE WHEN '상품 준비중' THEN 1 WHEN '배송 준비중' THEN 2 WHEN '배송중' THEN 3 WHEN '배송완료' THEN 4 END;
